channel.title: RSC in other languages?
channel.description: Has anyone ever done RSC in another language? I live in Japan and it would be pretty cool if there was a way to translate some things to Japanese characters. Can RSC even support Unicode? Can you even change font in RSC?

item.title: RSC in other languages?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Aleka, post:6, topic:548171”][quote author=DeathsChaos9 link=topic=667077.msg4460811#msg4460811 date=1417478855]
Nice and clean… Infractions handed out to those who deserved them.
[/quote]

Thanks bro! I really appreciate it.

@Cleako, isn’t as easy as manually translating strings of text into East asian languages. The unicode isn’t supported. I had trouble using Korean text with RSC and never got round to messing with it enough to fix it.

If you progress with this Alwka, let me know.

Will do
감사합니다

Why? Is there an RSC playing community in Japan? I’d be surprised if Jagex had much market penetration into the asian countries in the early 2000s.

No Runescape doesn’t exist here :/. However the fact that it is a simple game with simple English it could be a powerful study tool especially because English is mandatory to learn here in school just a thought :-). Some of my Japanese friends are very curious about it when they see me on it.[/quote]

별말씀을요.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC in other languages?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

If the RSC client uses sprite sheets for fonts you’ll have to convert each character over, or you can replace its rendering with something that supports native fonts.

Read full topic

Lothy:

Why? Is there an RSC playing community in Japan? I’d be surprised if Jagex had much market penetration into the asian countries in the early 2000s.

No Runescape doesn’t exist here :/. However the fact that it is a simple game with simple English it could be a powerful study tool especially because English is mandatory to learn here in school just a thought :-). Some of my Japanese friends are very curious about it when they see me on it.

item.title: RSC in other languages?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Yes font changing is doable. I don’t know about Unicode but manually translating strings of text is quite doable.

Read full topic
